summary: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.
cast: Chantal Quesnelle|Fiona Dourif|Jordan Gavaris|Danielle Bisutti|A Martinez|Maitland McConnell|Brennan Elliott|Summer H. Howell|Adam Hurtig|Darren Wall|Will Woytowich|Anne Leveille|Kally Berard|Kyle Nobess|Brad Dourif|Bobby Robidoux|Tyhr Trubiak|Kevin Anderson|Candace Smith|Ali Tataryn|Jennifer Tilly|Jacqueline Rano|Chris Sarandon|Alex Vincent|Rick Dunsford|Jim Kirby|Cindy Myskiw|Lorrie Papadopoulos|Karen Tusa
